description: View MSG and EML files without Outlook or any other email client for free with Coolutils Mail Viewer. Open any email as a regular file. Apart from viewing, you can move, copy or delete MSG and EML files. Moreover, Coolutils Mail Viewer can produce a full report on your MSG/EML files. Create a list of senders or recepients - you choose the fields to your needs.
summary: View MSG and EML files without Outlook or any other email client for free
author: CoolUtils
